Title: The Wonders of the World
Description:
My husband Thomas has gained many insights from exploring these primal lands.

Perhaps following in his footsteps would similarly inspire you?
ObjectivesText: Find out how Thomas gains his artisan's insight.
RewardText:
Huh, this is really interesting! I guess you never know where you'll find knowledge.

Keep an eye out for any treasures like this. Maybe there will be more wisdom to find in the world.

And thanks for seeing this vista with me. It's really spectacular, isn't it?
